projects.title: 3D Interactive Cube with Nodes and Vectors
projects.description: A Three.js visualization showing a 3D cube with dynamic nodes and connecting vectors.

projects.title: AI Pathfinding Experiments
projects.description: A comparative demonstration of pathfinding implementations using the A* algorithm, created by different AI systems.

projects.title: Align Center
projects.description: A simple tool to center-align text or other elements within a given container.

projects.title: Asteroids
projects.description: A classic arcade game where players control a spaceship to destroy asteroids and avoid collisions.

projects.title: Astro-Claus
projects.description: Astro-Claus is a festive space-themed game where you navigate through a starry sky, collecting gifts and avoiding obstacles.

projects.title: Boids Simulation
projects.description: An interactive implementation of Craig Reynolds' Boids algorithm, demonstrating emergent flocking behavior through simple rules.

projects.title: Cat Behavior Simulation
projects.description: An interactive simulation of feline behavior patterns in a home environment, visualizing how cats interact with their surroundings over time.

projects.title: Caterpillar Game
projects.description: A creative take on the classic snake game, featuring a segmented caterpillar with overlapping body parts and image-based rendering.

projects.title: Charge
projects.description: An initial attempt to model capacitor 'charge' and 'discharge'

projects.title: Chart Explorer
projects.description: An interactive tool to explore different types of charts and visualize data in various formats.

projects.title: Color Theory Explorer
projects.description: An interactive visualization tool for learning about color theory and experimenting with different color harmonies on a dynamic color wheel.

projects.title: D3.js Visualization Playground
projects.description: An interactive exploration of data visualization techniques using the D3.js library.

projects.title: Double Pendulum
projects.description: A simulation of a double pendulum, showcasing chaotic motion and basic physics principles.

projects.title: Drone Bomber Game
projects.description: A canvas-based scrolling game with a top-down view of a battlefield where players control a drone.

projects.description: An interactive mathematical visualization exploring the beautiful relationship in Euler's identity: e^(i�) + 1 = 0.

projects.description: An interactive practice test for the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner exam with automated scoring and feedback.

projects.description: A playground for experimenting with CSS Flexbox, allowing users to create flexible and responsive layouts.

projects.description: An interactive art piece where pixels flow, creating a visual background for use in other contexts.

projects.title: FM Radio
projects.description: A simple FM radio wave simulation

projects.description: An animated visualization of Foerster Resonance, showcasing energy transfer between molecules.

projects.description: math physics

projects.title: Graph-Math
projects.description: A simple interface that allows users to play with nodes and edges (graph theory).

projects.title: GraphQL - Exploring Countries
projects.description: An interactive single-page application for exploring GraphQL queries against the public Countries API.

projects.description: An enhanced version of a grid-based game where users can interact with colliding block in new ways.

projects.description: An interactive simulation of spirograph patterns through mathematical hypotrochoid curves.

projects.description: A musical exploration tool with color-coded sound buttons featuring progressively deeper pitch and brightness variations.

projects.description: An interactive learning resource for exploring internet protocols, HTTP/HTTPS concepts, and API testing tools with a clean, accessible interface.

projects.description: A web application for problem solving, path planning, and step management with AI assistance.

projects.description: An animated visualization of the Lorenz Attractor, showcasing chaotic behavior in a three-dimensional space.

projects.description: An staic visualization of the Mandelbrot Set, showcasing the beauty of fractals and complex numbers.

projects.description: An interactive tool for exploring, testing, and understanding regular expressions with practical examples.

projects.description: An interactive learning tool for TypeScript fundamentals with interactive code snippets and detailed explanations.

projects.description: An animated visualization of wave interference, showcasing the superposition of waves and their resulting patterns.
